Posts.EditableText: As it stands, you can check to see if the player has an item (object) when they enter a room. What about checking to see if they don't have it?
Posts.HTML: As it stands, you can check to see if the player has an item (object) when they enter a room. What about checking to see if they don't have it?

Posts.EditableText:
I believe you can say "not have" in an if/else statement.

"do action if player NOT has object"
Posts.HTML:
I believe you can say "not have" in an if/else statement.

"do action if player NOT has object"
